citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:45pm on
Monday, March 3, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but was told by a family member that they were
not available and were not expected to be for several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:45pm on 
Monday, March 3, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee but was told by a family member that they were 
not available and were not expected to be for several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records 
for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
